welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Collingdale, known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore our city and embrace its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers, offering exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport, where most domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, including perishable and oversized items.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling in luxury, the private jet terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport offers exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited signal in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private or chartered aircraft, the private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience with dedicated staff and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
